text:
her took a breath, trying to control his expression. He still wasn't over the boy's straightforwardness - it actually caught him off guard and he wasn't completely sure how to react.
Hyunjin put a hand on his hip, trying to seem calm, but his face still had a bit of redness to it.
"I... Yeah, that was a bit... weird, I suppose. I was just trying to assert my authority on you, that's all."
trans:
il prit une inspiration, essayant de contrôler son expression. Il n'était toujours pas remis de la franchise du garçon - cela l'avait pris de court et il n'était pas tout à fait sûr de comment réagir.
Hyunjin posa une main sur sa hanche, essayant de paraître calme, mais son visage était encore un peu rouge.
« Je... Ouais, c'était un peu... bizarre, je suppose. J'essayais juste d'affirmer mon autorité sur toi, c'est tout. »
